meanings.definition: The process of setting type by means of photographic techniques.
meanings.sent1: Photosetting allows for precise placement of text using photographs.
meanings.sent2: In the past, photosetting was a common method for creating newspapers.
meanings.sent3: The photosetting machine decided to take a break and develop its own photos.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a photosetting machine, arranging thoughts with precision.
meanings.sent5: The photosetting process made the words on the page look like they were floating in air.

meanings.definition: The act or process of producing printed material using photosetting technology.
meanings.sent1: Photosetting technology revolutionized the printing industry.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in photosetting to speed up their production.
meanings.sent3: The photosetting machine told a joke and printed out a laughing emoji.
meanings.sent4: His creativity was a photosetting machine, churning out new ideas constantly.
meanings.sent5: The photosetting technology made the final product look professional and polished.
